metadata.name: #01 The Entrepreneur Ape
metadata.description:
Welcome to ☆☆☆Future of Apes☆☆☆ 

This collection focus on 3D / Motion Graphics Art representing the Future of Apes in the world of NFT and Metaverse. Each NFT is unique and custom-designed by hand-drawing tools. It is my artistic view of today's world and the future of apes in the digital world.

After a purchase a collector will get:

☆ A high resolution 4K rendered images (4000 x 4000) of the NFT

☆ 4K video of the NFT in mp4 format

☆ Infinite objects digital NFT frame to display your NFT delivered any part of the world 

☆ A signed physical-digital print masterpiece with frame delivered any part of the world

☆ 1 free NFT of Luxe Crypto Chick collection at Opensea and a whitelist spot to their upcoming 3D art collection.

***Please DM me on official Twitter after the purchase***
